title: 63- The Leaked Draft
description: On May 2, 2022 a draft majority opinion written by Justice Alito was leaked to the press. His draft opinion on Dobbs v. Jackson Women’s Health Organization overturns Roe v. Wade and puts many other constitutional rights the court has guaranteed under the 14th Amendment under threat.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
content:encoded: On May 2, 2022 a draft majority opinion written by Justice Alito was leaked to the press. His draft opinion on Dobbs v. Jackson Women’s Health Organization overturns Roe v. Wade and puts many other constitutional rights the court has guaranteed under the 14th Amendment under threat.
itunes:title: 63- The Leaked Draft
itunes:author: Roman Mars
itunes:summary: The leaked draft majority opinion that threatens to strike down the constitutional right to abortion and potentially many other rights
itunes:subtitle: The leaked draft majority opinion that threatens to strike down the constitutional right to abortion and potentially many other rights
itunes:keywords: abortion, roe, wade, mississippi, dobbs, plessy
